blogPost.excerpt:
Pre-order NHL 22 Deluxe Edition: http://x.ea.com/nhl22/yt-preorder 

EA SPORTS NHL 22 officially launches worldwide October 15th featuring Auston Matthews as your global cover athlete. 

Powered by Frostbite, EA SPORTS NHL 22 gets the superstar treatment. For the first time ever, experience hockey on one of the industry’s most powerful game engines bringing unrivaled visual detail to every hit, deke, and shot. Superstar X-Factors lets you feel the personality and power of NHL superstars with an all-new ability system that unlocks the unique skills of the league’s most elite players. From HUT to World of Chel, Superstar X-Factors brings new class based strategy to every game mode.

EA SPORTS NHL 22 is an all new game for a new generation, giving you more ways to play and compete than ever before. This is breakthrough hockey.

Subscribe for more NHL 22 Trailers: https://bit.ly/3kF5rTK
Follow us on TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@easportsnhl

#NHL22 #Reveal

THE ETERNALS Final Trailer Breakdown, Easter Eggs, Things You Missed, Story Explained & Plot Leaks. The official final trailer for the Eternals is here and in this Marvel Easter Egg video we breakdown the story, characters, things you missed and give our theories on what's gonna happen.

#TheEternals #Trailer #TrailerBreakdown #EasterEggs #ThingsYouMissed #Marvel #MCU

If you enjoyed this video then please subscribe to the channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCq3hT5JPPKy87JGbDls_5BQ?sub_confirmation=1

/* ----- SOCIAL MEDIA ----- */

Follow Me On Social Media At:
TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@heavyspoilers?lang=en
Twitter - https://twitter.com/heavyspoilers
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/heavyspoilers/
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/DeffinitionMC/


/* ----- VIDEO INFORMATION ----- */

0:00 The Eternals Final Trailer Breakdown Intro
0:42 Easter Eggs, Theories And Things You Missed
10:44 Reaction And Review


Welcome to the Heavy Spoilers show I'm your host Paul and though it feels like we're Eternally waiting for our door to be fixed Marvel are still giving that goodness with a brand new look at their upcoming film The Eternals.

In this video we're gonna be breaking down the easter eggs, hidden details and also giving our thoughts on what could be happening in the movie.

There might be some spoilers here so if you don't want anything ruined then I recommend that you turn off now.

If you enjoy the video then please smash the thumbs up button and don't forget to subscribe for videos like this each and every day.

With that out the way, thanks for clicking this now let's get into our breakdown of The Eternal's trailer.

Ok so the trailer itself actually confirms a lot of the plot leaks that we got early in the year in regards to a screening that happened for the movie. This includes that the Eternals were created by the Celestials in order to hunt predators known as the deviants.

According to what they said, the Deviants basically feasted on newly formed evolving worlds that had a sudden burst in life and this explains why they show up after the snap.

We learn this from Ajak played by Salma Hayek who we open the trailer on. From the first trailer we know that the Eternals came to Earth millenia ago and that they helped us to evolve. Though this trailer doesn't confirm it it's likely that they travelled here in order to fight the deviants and after they decided to rest and look after us because we're so adorable aren't we. Got our wars but we got our memes as well.

This was heavily shown in the first trailer and though they spent centuries together I think it's safe to say that they decided to split up and live apart on the planet.

However the threat of the deviants return brings them together and thus they have to team up once more. Now interestingly we don't see Ajak in any more present day scenes in the trailer.

Everytime she shows up it seems to be in a flashback or a scene set in an earlier part of the timeline. This could mean that Ikarus kills her and later on in the trailer we see him at the location firing his eye lasers.

I actually have a theory that Ikarus is bad and that he's angered over falling out of love with Sersi played by Gemma Chan. In the first look the pair were together for a long time but then they split up and it is rumoured that Sersi will now be dating Dane Whitman played by Kit Harrington.
